title: Djokovic still trying to regain his magic
text:
Djokovic still trying to regain his magic 10:04am BST - 01:50
The once all-conquering Serb Novak Djokovic advanced to the third round of the French Open but it was a shaky performance from the former world number one ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
